TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignedInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type SignedInfo = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Contains information about the canonicalization algorithm and signature algorithm used for the XML signature.

span.span: Contains information about the canonicalization algorithm and signature algorithm used for the XML signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 <`SignedInfo`> 元素的 XML 数字签名规范所定义的 XML 签名。The class represents the <`SignedInfo`> element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification. <`SignedInfo`> 元素，它是子元素的 <`Signature`> 元素，包含用于签名，用于签名和验证，并描述了数字签名的引用的算法规范化方法。The <`SignedInfo`> element, which is a subelement of the <`Signature`> element, contains the canonicalization method used for signing, the algorithm used for signing and validation, and references that describe a digital signature. 对于大多数情况下，你应使用类可从属性进行签名和验证 XML 数字签名。For most scenarios, you should use the class available from the property to sign and verify XML digital signatures. 有关详细信息 <`SignedInfo`> 元素，请参阅在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 规范。For more information about the <`SignedInfo`> element, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CanonicalizationMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CanonicalizationMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the canonicalization algorithm that is used before signing for the current object.

span.span: Gets or sets the canonicalization algorithm that is used before signing for the current object.

value.span: 为当前 对象签名前使用的规范化算法。

span.span: The canonicalization algorithm used before signing for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性使用字符串统一资源标识符 (URI) 来表示 <`Canonicalization`> 元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represent the <`Canonicalization`> element of an XML digital signature. 使用属性指定应用到的 XML 输出的规范化算法类，然后执行签名计算。Use the property to specify the canonicalization algorithm applied to the XML output of the class before performing signature calculations. 使用此属性与下表中列出的其中一个的 uri。Use one of the URIs listed in the following table with this property. |规范化方法Canonicalization Method|“值”Value| |-----------------------------|-----------| |规范的 XMLCanonical XML|http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315

这是默认方法。This is default method. 中也定义了以下静态字段： Also defined in the following static field: | |规范的 XML 注释Canonical XML with comments|http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xml-c14n-20010315#WithComments

中也定义了以下静态字段： Also defined in the following static field: | |独占规范的 XMLExclusive Canonical XML|http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#

中也定义了以下静态字段： Also defined in the following static field: | |独占规范 XML 注释Exclusive Canonical XML with comments|http://www.w3.org/2001/10/xml-exc-c14n#WithComments

中也定义了以下静态字段： Also defined in the following static field: | 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 规范。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

span.span: Gets a object used for canonicalization.
A object used for canonicalization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含使用对象类来规范化之前进行签名或验证 XML 文档。The property contains the object used by the class to canonicalize an XML document before signing or verifying. 属性是只读的。The property is read-only. 你可以修改内通过所需的转换到的统一资源标识符 (URI) 的传入此属性的对象属性。You can modify the object within this property by passing the desired transform Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the property.

span.span: is .

public: property System::Collections::ArrayList ^ References { System::Collections::ArrayList ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets a list of the objects of the current object.

span.span: Gets a list of the objects of the current object.
A list of the elements of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用的列表对象来表示``元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses a list of objects to represent the `` elements of an XML digital signature. 使用属性来描述转换，摘要算法，和摘要值的 XML 数字签名。Use the property to describe the transforms, digest algorithms, and digest values of an XML digital signature. 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 规范。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SignatureMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SignatureMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

value.span: 算法名称，用于当前 对象的签名生成和验证。

span.span: The name of the algorithm used for signature generation and validation for the current object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性使用字符串来统一资源标识符 (URI) 的表示``元素的 XML 数字签名。The property uses a string Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to represents the `` element of an XML digital signature. 使用属性以指定要用于签名生成和验证算法。Use the property to specify the algorithm to use for signature generation and verification. 此属性标识创建的 XML 数字签名，包括哈希，公钥算法、 消息身份验证代码 (Mac)，和填充涉及到的所有加密功能。This property identifies all cryptographic functions involved in creating an XML digital signature, including hashing, public key algorithms, Message Authentication Codes (MACs), and padding. 使用一个具有此属性的以下表格中的 Uri。Use one of the URIs in the following table with this property. |签名方法Signature Method|“值”Value| |----------------------|-----------| |HMAC-SHA1HMAC-SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#hmac-sha1

中也定义了以下静态字段： Also defined in the following static field: | |使用 SHA1 DSADSA with SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#dsa-sha1

中也定义了以下静态字段： Also defined in the following static field: | |使用 SHA1 RSARSA with SHA1|http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#rsa-sha1

中也定义了以下静态字段： Also defined in the following static field: | 有关 XML 数字签名的详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会 (W3C) [XML 签名语法和处理规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)。For more information about XML digital signatures, see the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [XML Signature Syntax and Processing Specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/).
